document.full_text: teens lauren alaina and scotty mccreery sing on tuesday for the 2011 "american idol" title in the tv show's youngest-ever, and first all-country music finale.
document.title: lauren, scotty bring country to "american idol" finale
lines_and_colors: teens lauren alaina and scotty mccreery sing on tuesday for the 2011 "american idol" title in the tv show's youngest-ever, and first all-country music finale.
